name: Temple (saltyn, theLudovyc)
description:
Finds a way out...

Thank you for testing our game, it was coded during the #JamEstLa-3.

Assets
Modular Temple Pack: Fertile Soil Productions

Sounds
Most of the  sound effects come from Freesound, the respective owners have their name in the sounds directory.
The others come from Kenney

Font
Kenney

Source
https://github.com/salty64/Temple

Help
Thanks to the entire community of the discord "Godot est arrivé!" for its support.

Thanks to Koneko and Antharuu for being sometimes more "salty" than me.

Thank you theludovyc for being my dev- partner.

Salty
